name: Pixel Battle Royale Ground Gun
description:
A great battle in the Pixel Battle Royale Ground Gun 2018!
If you like military block games with pixels, then you will like Pixel Battleground Royale!

Genre Battle Ground Royale pixel gun is a unique new genre that is liked by all gamers around the world! You can play it for 4 people, 2 and one to become the king of the royal battle!

Jump out of the plane of survival on a dead island, find the best prey, kill the enemies first to become the king of the royal battle. Players land on the island without weapons and must find and use different weapons and items to destroy enemies while the area area is decreasing and trying to push the enemies on the map.

Features:
- Unique sandbox mode
- A huge map with great possibilities
- Pixel Graphics & Blocky Characters: battle as funny block characters and show your style of gameplay.
- Battle in online multiplayer games: Intense PVP gameplay against players around the world!
- The big island of radiation is where you need to survive when you're playing in a block city.
- Multiplayer game - absolutely free online game for download.

Become king of the royal battle in the Pixel Battle Royale Ground Gun in 2018!
Rejoice yourself and your loved ones!
